title.rendered: Leveraging the Power of Labels — Best Practices with UVA

content.rendered:
This webinar is part of the 2020 Handshake Access Summer Series.

Nathan Hunsaker, Associate Director of Technology & Data at the University of Virginia, will share how his team uses labels to drive messaging and student outreach plus best practices for label maintenance.

Read this case study for key takeaways from Nathan’s presentation.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: The use of labels in Handshake in helping students move through their career journey.
